title: Simon Hix on the results of the Scottish independence referendum
itunes:author: Professor Simon Hix
description: Contributor(s): Professor Simon Hix | Professor Simon Hix discusses the results of the Scottish independence referendum and the future of both Scotland and the rest of the UK. Credits: Martin Rogers (Filming and Editing), Maria Rolo (Filming and Editing).
itunes:summary: Contributor(s): Professor Simon Hix | Professor Simon Hix discusses the results of the Scottish independence referendum and the future of both Scotland and the rest of the UK. Credits: Martin Rogers (Filming and Editing), Maria Rolo (Filming and Editing).
